title: Astro Pop (1-click run)(registred)
description:
No need to install,
No need to put serials and cracks to get the full version, (already done it for you).
No unnecessary registry changes, 
No boring installation of tool-bars in your browser,
You can even run this torrent from USB-Stick.
This makes a '1-click run' version a better version.

Blast off with earth-shattering arcade puzzle action! Match four bricks, use combos and powerups and unleash your SUPA weapon to score big points!

As you progress through this space adventure, you will unlock the use of all 4 characters, each with their own brick-busting super powers. Each character has their own strengths to help you complete your quest.

Astro Pop features some amazing sound effects and brilliantly colored graphics that make this game pop out of computer screen. See if you can go the distance and beat all the levels!
